    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">ä¸€å¥—åŸºäº Material Design è§„èŒƒå®ç°çš„ Blazor å’Œ Razor é€šç”¨ç»„ä»¶åº“</span>

<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>å‰è¨€<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>ä»Šå¤©å¤§å§šç»™å¤§å®¶åˆ†äº«ä¸€å¥—åŸºäº <span>Material Design è§„èŒƒå®ç°çš„ã€å¼€æºï¼ˆMIT licenseï¼‰ä¸”å…è´¹çš„ Blazor å’Œ Razor é€šç”¨ç»„ä»¶åº“ï¼šMatBlazorã€‚</span></span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span><span>Blazorä»‹ç»<span><br></span></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>Blazor æ˜¯åŸºäº HTMLã€CSS å’Œ C# çš„ç°ä»£å‰ç«¯ Web æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œå¯å¸®åŠ©ä½ æ›´å¿«åœ°ç”Ÿæˆ Web åº”ç”¨ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨ Blazorï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å¯ä»å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å’ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨è¿è¡Œçš„å¯é‡ç”¨ç»„ä»¶ç”Ÿæˆ Web åº”ç”¨ï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿æä¾›å‡ºè‰²çš„ Web ä½“éªŒã€‚</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span><span>ç»„ä»¶åº“å®‰è£…</span></span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span><span>å‘½ä»¤å®‰è£…</span></span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-sec-load-status="2"><span><code><span>Install-Package MatBlazor<span><br></span></span></code></span></span></pre>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>æˆ–è€…</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-sec-load-status="2"><span><code><span>dotnet add package MatBlazor</span></code></span></span></pre>
<h3 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span><span>NuGetåŒ…ç®¡ç†å™¨å®‰è£…</span></span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250228001600370-580721079.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>è„šæœ¬å¼•å…¥<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>å¯¹äºå®¢æˆ·ç«¯å’ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨ç«¯çš„Blazoré¡¹ç›®éœ€è¦å°†è„šæœ¬éƒ¨åˆ†æ·»åŠ åˆ° index.html æˆ– _Host.cshtmlï¼ˆhead éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼‰ã€‚</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><span><code><span>&lt;script src="_content/MatBlazor/dist/matBlazor.js"<span>&gt;&lt;/script&gt;<span><br><span>&lt;link href="_content/MatBlazor/dist/matBlazor.css"<span>&nbsp;rel="stylesheet"<span>&nbsp;/&gt;</span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span><span>ç»„ä»¶åº“ä½¿ç”¨</span></span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span><span>Button</span></span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><span><code><span><span><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatButton OnClick="@Click"<span>&gt;Text @ButtonState&lt;/MatButton&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatButton Raised="true"<span>&gt;Raised&lt;/MatButton&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatButton Unelevated="true"<span>&gt;Unelevated&lt;/MatButton&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatButton Outlined="true"<span>&gt;Outlined&lt;/MatButton&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatButton Dense="true"<span>&gt;Dense&lt;/MatButton&gt;<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; @code<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; string ButtonState =&nbsp;""<span>;<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; void Click(MouseEventArgs e)<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ButtonState =&nbsp;"Clicked"<span>;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></span></pre>

<h3 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>TreeView</span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><span><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatTreeView TNode="TreeNodeModel"<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;RootNode="@MyRootNode"<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;GetChildNodesCallback="@((n)=&gt;n.Nodes)"<span>&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;NodeTemplate&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; @context.Name<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/NodeTemplate&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/MatTreeView&gt;<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; @code<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; class TreeNodeModel<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public string Name { get;&nbsp;set<span>; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public TreeNodeModel[] Nodes { get;&nbsp;set<span>; } = new TreeNodeModel[0];<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; TreeNodeModel MyRootNode = new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>()<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Book"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Nodes = new TreeNodeModel[] {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Chapter 1"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Nodes = new TreeNodeModel[] {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Heading"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; },<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Content"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; },<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Chapter 2"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; new&nbsp;TreeNodeModel<span>(){<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name =&nbsp;"Heading"<span>,<span><br><span>&nbsp; <h3 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>Tab</span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31atcS7mB3Y4o3JFMyiciaPU65tOBX66FsxcxKWmwuWUeuXtjLhyIJ7lHIKribbpPGxgw3tHbhy8KF7v/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><span><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatTabGroup&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatTab Label="First"<span>&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; First Content<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/MatTab&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatTab Label="Second"<span>&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Second Content<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/MatTab&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;MatTab&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;LabelContent&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Third &lt;MatIcon Icon="@MatIconNames.Close"<span>&gt;&lt;/MatIcon&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/LabelContent&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;ChildContent&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Third Content<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/ChildContent&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/MatTab&gt;<span><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/MatTabGroup&gt;<span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></span></pre>

<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>é¡¹ç›®æºç åœ°å€<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>æ›´å¤šé¡¹ç›®å®ç”¨åŠŸèƒ½å’Œç‰¹æ€§æ¬¢è¿å‰å¾€é¡¹ç›®å¼€æºåœ°å€æŸ¥çœ‹ğŸ‘€ï¼Œåˆ«å¿˜äº†ç»™é¡¹ç›®ä¸€ä¸ªStaræ”¯æŒğŸ’–ã€‚</span></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span><span>ä¼˜ç§€é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ç²¾é€‰</span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>è¯¥é¡¹ç›®å·²æ”¶å½•åˆ°C#/.NET/.NET Coreä¼˜ç§€é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ç²¾é€‰ä¸­ï¼Œå…³æ³¨ä¼˜ç§€é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ç²¾é€‰èƒ½è®©ä½ åŠæ—¶äº†è§£C#ã€.NETå’Œ.NET Coreé¢†åŸŸçš„æœ€æ–°åŠ¨æ€å’Œæœ€ä½³å®è·µï¼Œæé«˜å¼€å‘å·¥ä½œæ•ˆç‡å’Œè´¨é‡ã€‚å‘å·²æŒ–ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿å¤§å®¶è¸Šè·ƒæäº¤PRæ¨èæˆ–è‡ªèï¼ˆè®©ä¼˜ç§€çš„é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ä¸è¢«åŸ‹æ²¡ğŸ¤ï¼‰ã€‚</span></p>

<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;">
æœ¬æ–‡ç‰ˆæƒå½’ä½œè€…å’Œåšå®¢å›­å…±æœ‰ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿è½¬è½½ï¼Œä½†æœªç»ä½œè€…åŒæ„å¿…é¡»ä¿ç•™æ­¤æ®µå£°æ˜ï¼Œä¸”åœ¨æ–‡ç« é¡µé¢æ˜æ˜¾ä½ç½®ç»™å‡ºåŸæ–‡é“¾æ¥ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¿ç•™è¿½ç©¶æ³•å¾‹è´£ä»»çš„æƒåˆ©ã€‚å¦‚æœè¯¥ç¯‡æ–‡ç« å¯¹æ‚¨æœ‰å¸®åŠ©çš„è¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç‚¹ä¸€ä¸‹å³ä¸‹è§’çš„<a onclick="votePost(cb_entryId,'Digg')" href="javascript:void(0)" style="color:red;">ã€â™¥æ¨èâ™¥ã€‘</a>ï¼Œå¸Œæœ›èƒ½å¤ŸæŒç»­çš„ä¸ºå¤§å®¶å¸¦æ¥å¥½çš„æŠ€æœ¯æ–‡ç« ï¼Œæ–‡ä¸­å¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨æè¿°ä¸æ­£ç¡®çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿æŒ‡æ­£æˆ–è¡¥å……ï¼Œä¸èƒœæ„Ÿæ¿€ã€‚
